name: Commission established
text: §440-2  Commission established.  There shall be a board which shall be known as the state boxing commission of Hawaii.  The commission shall consist of five members.  At least one of the members shall be a member of USA Boxing, Inc.  One member shall be designated by the governor as chairperson of the commission. [L 1929, c 216, §1; RL 1935, §6991; am L 1937, c 213, §1; RL 1945, §7552; am L 1951, c 307, §2; RL 1955, §165-2; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §5; HRS §440-2; am L 1983, c 241, §2; am L 1992, c 202, §46; am L 2004, c 135, §3]
